articles.title: US will take Greenland ‘one way or the other,’ Trump says - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “We strongly support your right to determine your own future,” Trump tells Greenlanders — before vowing he’ll “try and get” the territory.
articles.content: But he added: We need Greenland for national security and even international security. And we're working with everybody involved to try and get it And I think we're going to get it one way or the oth… [+849 chars]
